```{r setup}

```

#### load the NomeMatrix data for 2 replicates Adnp_KO and WT

```{r}
NomeMatrix <- readRDS(file = file.path("/tungstenfs/scratch/gbuehler/bioinfo/Rpackages/data_preparation/",
                                       "Nome_matrix_GCHamp.rds"))
```

#### generate read counts for TF open nuc 

```{r}
patternQuant <- stateQuant(NomeMatrix,nr=10)
```
